subject: Re: [junit] need help
msgSnippet: ... If you want to put cdList into a specific state before each test, then put that code in the setUp() method. protected void setUp() { cdList.add....;
messageBody:
>So said Mukund Patel on 2003-05-08 --------------------
>Hi,
>
>How can I take the value of variable of my tested class in other testcase
>( test function ) which is updated in my another testcase.

If you want to put cdList into a specific state before each test, then put that code in the setUp() method.

protected void setUp() {
cdList.add....;
cdList.add....;
cdList.add....;
cdList.add....;
}

And one more thing: type clientDataList. Abbreviations only obscure understanding.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
